Package com.designPatterns.AbstractFactory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Color
    Interface for defining the Color Factory.
    Shape
    Shape Factory interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFactory
    Defining the abstract factory for implementor factories which then returns an appropriate factory according to given input .On receiving a Implementor factory it will give us an instance of required class.
    AbstractFactoryProducerDemo  
    ColorFactory
    ColorFactory gives an instance of appropriate class depending on user input.Since it deals with only defining the Color of the Shape object therefore we will leave getShape method empty and only define the getColor method.
    FactroyProducer
    This demo illustrates the use of Factory Design Pattern.
    Green
    Implementor class for the Color Interface Factory with fill method.
    Rectangle
    Implementor class for Shape Factory Interface with draw method
    Red  
    ShapeFactory
    Shape Factory extending ABstract Factory and inherited methods for getting color and shape.Since its sole responsibility is to define the shape attribute so we leave the color method as it is.
    Square
